description: The Polo Soft fit puts a modern spin on classic preppy style with a natural shoulder and a half-canvassed construction. This version offers the look of traditional tailoring with the comfort of a cardigan thanks to its smooth double-knit fabric.
fitting_details: Polo Soft: trim fit, with a natural shoulder, a high armhole, 3.25" lapels, and a shorter length.
Size medium has a 30" front body length, a 29.5" back body length, an 18.5" shoulder, and an 18.25" sleeve inseam.
Notch lapels. Buttonhole at the left lapel. Three-button silhouette.
Left chest welt pocket. Two front waist patch pockets. Two interior chest pockets.
Single vent. Lined at the back yoke and the sleeves.
Alterations available in Ralph Lauren retail stores.
Shell: 59% polyester, 41% cotton. Sleeve lining: 100% viscose.
Model is 6'1" (185 cm) and wears a size medium.
